metadata.title: CVE-2020-24585 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the DTLS handshake implementation in wolfSSLbefore 4.5.0. Clear DTLS application_data messages in epoch 0 do notproduce an out-of-order error. Instead, these messages are returned to theapplication.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
